thread.title: Woman Escapes Rape Attempt After Overpowering Thug With Self-Defense Moves
thread.title_full: Woman Escapes Rape Attempt After Overpowering Thug With Self-Defense Moves

author: Davis
title: Woman Escapes Rape Attempt After Overpowering Thug With Self-Defense Moves
text:
Punk Drugs His Date’s Drink, Has No Idea Bartender Saw It and Swapped Their Glasses! 
After being beaten for several minutes, Herron remembered a self-defense class she had taken just three weeks earlier — a class that had prepared her to deal with men like Steiner. 
“All those little things that I learned in my life … how to punch and everything came back to me,” Herron explained. “I started to feel like I was going to lose consciousness … but I got another surge of adrenaline, and I reached for the door and was able to get out.” 
KOMO News reported that a passerby had a carabiner which they used to lock Steiner in the restroom until police arrived and arrested him.   
While Herron did sustain several serious cuts and bruises from this assault, she isn’t going to let it stop her from running the marathon she was training for this summer, Newser reported. 
There are a lot of horrible people in this world. Thankfully, we live in a country where people can have the means to fight back, either through self-defense classes or through the Second Amendment.
